trans-unit.source: Contains state information and event data associated with a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 包含与路由事件相关联的状态信息和事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Different RoutedEventArgs can be used with a single <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用单个<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>使用不同为 RoutedEventArgs

trans-unit.source: This class is responsible for packaging the event data for a <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>, providing extra event state information, and is used by the event system for invoking the handler associated with the routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此类负责打包的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>，提供额外的事件状态信息，和由事件系统，用于调用处理程序与路由事件相关联。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When using this parameterless constructor, all public properties of the new <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> instance assume the following default values: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当使用此无参数构造函数，所有公共属性的新<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>实例假定有以下默认值:-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> defaults to `false` - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>默认为`false`-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Null values for <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> only mean that the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> data makes no attempt to specify the source.
trans-unit.target: 为空值<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>只意味着<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>数据使不尝试指定源。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this instance is used in a call to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> values are populated based on the element that raised the event and are passed on to listeners through the routing.
trans-unit.target: 当在调用中使用此实例<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>填充基于引发该事件，并会传递到侦听器通过路由的元素的值。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> class, using the supplied routed event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref>类，使用提供的路由的事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: When using this overloaded constructor, unspecified properties of the new <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> instance assume the following default values: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> defaults to `false` - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此重载的构造函数时，未指定属性的新<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>实例假定有以下默认值:-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>默认为`false`-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Null values for <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> only mean that this <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> makes no attempt to specify the source.
trans-unit.target: 为空值<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>只意味着此<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>不尝试指定源。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this instance is used in a call to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> values are populated based on the element that raised the event and are passed on to listeners through the routing.
trans-unit.target: 当在调用中使用此实例<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>填充基于引发该事件，并会传递到侦听器通过路由的元素的值。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The routed event identifier for this instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的路由的事件标识符<xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> class, using the supplied routed event identifier, and providing the opportunity to declare a different source for the event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref>类，使用提供的路由的事件的标识符，并提供机会来声明不同源的事件。

trans-unit.source: When using this overloaded constructor, unspecified properties of the new <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> instance assume the following default values: - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> defaults to `false` - <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> defaults to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此重载的构造函数时，未指定属性的新<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>实例假定有以下默认值:-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>默认为`false`-<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>默认为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Null values for <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> are populated based on the element that raised the event and passed on through the routing, but will read `null` prior to invocation.
trans-unit.target: 为空值<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>都基于引发事件并将其通过路由的元素填充，但将读取`null`之前调用。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this signature when passing <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> to virtuals such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.OnSelectionChanged%2A>, where the arguments are used to call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> internally.
trans-unit.target: 传递时使用此签名<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>到虚方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.OnSelectionChanged%2A>、 自变量用于调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>内部。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.OnSelectionChanged%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The routed event identifier for this instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的路由的事件标识符<xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: An alternate source that will be reported when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 处理事件时将报告一个备用源。

trans-unit.source: This pre-populates the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: 这将预先填充<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the present state of the event handling for a routed event as it travels the route.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示的事件处理路由事件在路由过程的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Marking the event handled will limit the visibility of the routed event to listeners along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 将标记为处理的事件将限制到侦听器为由事件路由的路由事件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The event does still travel the remainder of the route, but only handlers specifically added with `HandledEventsToo` `true` in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method call will be invoked in response.
trans-unit.target: 事件仍经过的其余部分的路由，但仅处理程序专门添加与`HandledEventsToo``true`中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>将在响应中调用方法调用。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Default handlers on instance listeners (such as those expressed in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]) will not be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 默认实例侦听器上的处理程序 (如那些用表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]) 将不会调用。

trans-unit.source: Handling events that are marked handled is not a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: 处理标记处理的事件不是一种常见方案。

trans-unit.source: If you are a control author defining your own events, the decisions you make regarding event handling at the class level will impact users of your control as well as any users of derived controls, and potentially other elements that are either contained by your control or that contain your control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是控件作者定义您自己的事件，你做的决策有关事件处理在类级别会影响控件的用户以及派生控件的所有用户和可能都是其他元素包含的控件或包含您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标记作为 Handled，和类处理的路由事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: In very rare circumstances it is appropriate to handle events where Handled is marked `true`, and modify the event arguments by changing Handled to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在极少数情况下很适合于处理事件其中标记 Handled `true`，并修改事件自变量更改为 Handled `false`。

trans-unit.source: This can be necessary in certain areas of input events of controls, such as key handling of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> versus <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput> where low level and high level input events compete for the handling, and each is attempting to work with a different routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是必需的输入控件的事件的例如密钥处理的某些方面<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>与<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput>，低级别和高级别输入的事件会争用处理，并且每个正试图使用不同的路由策略。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: If setting, set to<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref> if the event is to be marked handled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，将设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>如果事件将标记为已处理; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If reading this value,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref> indicates that either a class handler, or some instance handler along the route, has already marked this event handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取此值，<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""> </xref>指示类处理程序或在路由过程，某个实例处理程序已标记处理此事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.indicates that no such handler has marked the event handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>指示没有此类处理标记为已处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，使您能够以基实现相比可提高效率的特定类型的方式调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation incorporates reflection to determine the right handler for any case where the handler is not literally <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler>, and this reflection step does have some performance consequences.
trans-unit.target: 基实现包含反射来确定正确的处理程序的任何情况，该处理程序不是按原义<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler>，并且此反射步骤具有某些性能产生负面影响。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Invocations can be made more efficient by not relying on reflection.
trans-unit.target: 调用可以通过更高效不依赖于反射。

trans-unit.source: This is the scenario that motivates this method being available for any routed event arguments class that choose to override it.
trans-unit.target: 这是使得此方法可用于选择重写任何路由的事件自变量类的方案。

trans-unit.source: Implementations should not call the base for this method, because your implementation should already be responsible for invoking the type safe handlers.
trans-unit.target: 实现不应调用基对于此方法，因为您的实现已应负责调用类型安全的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 泛型处理程序 / 委托实现调用。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 应在其调用提供的处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a notification callback entry point whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*> property of an instance changes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时提供通知回调入口点时的值<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>的某个实例发生变化的属性。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>

trans-unit.source: The new value that <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*> is being set to.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>正被设置为。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the original reporting source as determined by pure hit testing, before any possible <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*> adjustment by a parent class.
trans-unit.target: 获取原始报告源由纯命中测试，任何可能在<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>调整父类</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>前

trans-unit.source: This property acquires its value once, before the class event handlers or any instance handlers are invoked, and is never adjusted past this point.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取其值后之前类, 实例的任何处理或事件处理程序调用，以及永远不会调整忽略这一点。

trans-unit.source: The original source information is read-only to class handlers or class implementations, just as it is reported in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 原始的源信息是只读的类处理程序或类实现中，就像它将被报告中的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Common cases where the source may be adjusted include content elements inside a content model for a control (the contents of a list item, for instance, will report the list item element as the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> and the actual element within the list item will be the OriginalSource.
trans-unit.target: 其中可能调整源的常见用例包含控件的内容模型内的内容元素 (列表项，例如，内容将报告作为列表项元素<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>和列表项中的实际元素将 OriginalSource。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Source adjustment by various elements and content models varies from class to class.
trans-unit.target: 由各种元素和内容模型的源调整而异类类。

trans-unit.source: Each class that adjusts event sources attempts to anticipate which source is the most useful to report for most input scenarios and the scenarios for which the class is intended, and then sets that source as the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调整事件源的每个类尝试预测哪个源是最有用报告最输入的方案和为其类旨在，，然后将该源设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>的方案

trans-unit.source: If this source is not the one that has relevance to your handling of the event, try checking OriginalSource instead to see if it reports a different source that is more suitable.
trans-unit.target: 如果此源不是一个具有与你处理事件的相关性，请尝试改为检查 OriginalSource 以确定它是否报告更适合的不同源。

trans-unit.source: For more details on input events, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 输入事件的更多详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The original reporting source, before any possible <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*> adjustment made by class handling, which may have been done to flatten composited element trees.
trans-unit.target: 在任何可能之前的原始报告源<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>类处理可能对展平复合元素树进行的调整。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the RoutedEvent associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此关联 RoutedEvent <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"> </xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this value on a <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> that has already been routed (for instance, if you obtained the arguments through a handler).
trans-unit.target: 无法将此值设置上<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>，已经传送 （例如，如果你获得通过处理程序的自变量）。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to do so will generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试这样做将产生异常。

trans-unit.source: You can only set it on an instance that has not yet been used to generate an invocation of the event.
trans-unit.target: 你仅可以将其设置不尚未已用于生成事件的调用的实例上。

trans-unit.source: The value of RoutedEvent cannot be `null` at any time.
trans-unit.target: RoutedEvent 值不能为`null`在任何时间。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the event that has been invoked.
trans-unit.target: 已调用事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to change the RoutedEvent value while the event is being routed.
trans-unit.target: 试图更改 RoutedEvent 值时在路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对引发事件的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: For any bubbling routed event that has actually traveled the route beyond the element that raised it, and for any tunneling routed event that has not yet tunneled down to the element that raised it, the value of Source will be different than the value of the `sender` parameter of the event arguments class.
trans-unit.target: 任何冒泡路由实际经过超出引发它，元素的路由的事件的源的值对于任何隧道路由给引发它的元素不具有尚未隧道的事件，将为不同的值`sender`事件自变量类的参数。

trans-unit.source: Which of the two elements involved in the event is of the most importance in any given handler (Source, the element that raised it, or `sender`, the element that is currently handling it) is dependent on the application logic that your handler is addressing.
trans-unit.target: 这两个元素的事件中涉及属于最任何给定的处理程序中的重要性 (源，引发它，该元素或`sender`，当前正在处理它的元素) 依赖于解决你的处理程序的应用程序逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is typically only done when overriding or implementing other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that adjust event sources, such as when class handling an event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性通常只是当重写或实现其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]调整事件源，例如，当处理事件的类。

trans-unit.source: Resetting apparent event sources from instance handlers is not recommended, particularly when the handler does not mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 不建议重置明显的事件源的实例处理，尤其是在处理程序不会不将该事件标记为已处理时。

trans-unit.source: If you do reset Source to report a different event source, <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A> will continue to report the source as first raised by the originating <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行重置源报告的不同事件源，<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>起源引起作为第一个的源的报表将继续<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.OriginalSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的对象。
